scripts.watch: npm run watch-bootstrap & npm run watch-components & npm run watch-stories
scripts.install: npm run install-bootstrap && npm run install-components && npm run install stories
scripts.install-bootstrap: npm install -g grunt-cli && cd packages/timecrowd-bootstrap && npm install && gem install bundler && bundle install && npm link
scripts.install-components: cd packages/timecrowd-components && npm install && npm link
scripts.install-stories: cd packages/timecdowd-stories && npm install && npm link timecrowd-bootstrap && npm link timecrowd-components
